author: newsr.in
title: Jill Duggar, Husband Offer Refunds on Donations After Missionary Work Is Questioned
text: Jill (nee Duggar) and husband Derick Dillard have acknowledged talk that they used money they received as donations for their missionary work in Central America to fund “family vacations,” by offering donors the possibility to ask for refunds. The Duggars have been surrounded by controversy since this spring, when ol... »
